# [Interview #1155: Calamity-Philadelphia, PA, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1155#17)

#### Question

Is Drehy Terris?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No, his descriptions are because Drehy is based on a friend, just an inside joke.
